title: Biden lawyers wrote to AG Garland objecting to aspects of Hur’s report
description: Special Counsel Robert Hur released the findings of his 15-month investigation into President Biden’s handling of classified documents, the White House wrote to Attorney General Merrick Garland to vehemently object to aspects of the report – including its “multiple denigrating statements” about the president’s memory.

The Prime Minister can no longer credibly claim that his plan is working or that he has turned the corner on more than fourteen years of economic decline under the Conservatives that has left Britain worse off.

description: Only a third of voters who backed the Conservatives in 2019 will vote for the party again at the next general election, according to a new poll. On Thursday, YouGov and WPI Strategy revealed that out of 4,000 voters who supported the Tories, just 37% would support them again if an election were held tomorrow.

title: We’re Running Out of Names for Trump. At Least Polite Ones.
description: Well, not all of us: Trump is conducting an experiment in unbound narcissism with no room for anybody else. It’s bonkers, it’s unscrupulous, it’s terrifying. Pick your put-down. It won’t be sufficiently heard because it won’t be remotely fresh.
